text:
Thorn | San Francisco or Remote (US based) | Full-time Contract | $90k - $150k | Software Engineer | https://www.wearethorn.org/

Thorn is searching for a Full Stack Engineer and a Full Stack Engineer with Data Engineering Experience to join its engineering team as a full-time (40 hrs/week) contractor. This is a 9 month contract, with the possibility of extension.

Thorn is a non-profit focused on building technology to defend children from sexual abuse. Working at Thorn gives you the opportunity to apply your skills, expertise and passion to directly impact the lives of vulnerable and abused children. Our staff solves dynamic, quickly evolving problems with our network of partners from tech companies, NGOs, and law enforcement agencies. If you are able to bring clarity to complexity and lightness to heavy problems, you could be a great fit for our team.

You will work on building an application from beginning to end that assists law enforcement in identifying the most vulnerable victims. The work spans engineering topics from single-page web application development to API endpoint creation to data engineering pipelines.

Find out more about what we are looking for and what it is like to work at Thorn and apply to the roles here:

Apply today! Contract Full Stack Engineer https://grnh.se/2a0058692

Apply today! Contract Full Stack Engineer with Data Engineering Experience https://grnh.se/f45524c22

Technologies we use: Node / React / TypeScript / Docker / Kubernetes / AWS / Terraform / Python / PostgreSQL
